issues.description: The method signature of getStockIngredients in the Stock class differs between the template and the reference solution. In the template (Stock.java), getStockIngredients() returns a List<StockIngredient>, but in the solution (Stock.java) it returns a StockIngredient[] array. This mismatch can confuse students when they compare their template code to the solution code.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the return type of getStockIngredients in both repositories. Either change the template to return a StockIngredient[] or update the solution to return a List<StockIngredient>, so that the method signature is consistent across both.
